name: Empty No.79
description: In human history, people have constructed the wrong culture in the wrong way and repeatedly followed the old road. People have accumulated experience and hollowed out their spirit with names such as "samadhi". Under the increasingly serious influence of the problem society, people's inner fear and everyone's pursuit of a sense of security have increased anxiety, pain and daily pressure, For most people, they are imagining their own way of escapism from real life to manage themselves, follow others and pursue nothingness. Due to people's lack of exploration of the unknown world, everyone enters the known through the known, and knowledge enters knowledge, so they can't feel the beauty and ugliness of new things, religion The obstacles created by the illusion brought by faith make people have an increasingly fierce pursuit of a sense of security. The so-called matter in the original text of Shi Ruifeng's works is to return to itself for consideration. Things are color, color space is nothing, things do something and don't do something, so it is spirit. All known things are not true, and the unknown is the real answer to life. This is the core value of Ruifeng Shi's series of creative activities of empty.
